headline: Did Helmerich & Payne's (HP) Saudi Rig Reactivation Signal a Turning Point for International Expansion?
summary: Helmerich & Payne, Inc. recently announced fourth-quarter and full-year financial results, revealing revenue growth to US$1.01 billion in Q4 and US$3.75 billion for the year, but reporting a net loss for both periods compared to net income a year earlier. The company also disclosed plans to recommence operations on seven previously suspended land rigs in Saudi Arabia throughout the first half of 2026, signaling increased activity in the Middle East and a reinforced commitment to...
